attributes.additional_details:
Remove the £725,000 tax payer funding for the The Tricycle Theatre.

The Tricycle banned London’s annual Jewish Film Festival because the festival organisers would not return  £1,400 they had received from the Israeli embassy.

Racism is bad enough but to fund it with taxpayers money is even worse.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Arts Council England who make funding decisions re the Tricycle.
